CRefObj<T>
template <typename T> struct
CRefObj

CRefObj is a smart class (similar to CComPtr) for managing a IRefCount-ed object's lifetime.

Parameters
T

type of object to manage

Header

{Link:#include "Base/Core/IRefCount.h"{Base/Core/IRefCount.h}}
